title: Jyouou
resume: Jyouou is a Japanese television drama broadcast on the TV Tokyo network on Fridays. It is in its third season. Jyouou is based on the manga Jyouou Virgin by Kurashina Ryō, adapted for the screen by Kajiki Minako. The show is produced by Okabe Shinji, Morita Noboru, Abe Shinji, Takahashi Kazuhiko and Iwata Kazuyuki. Directors include Iwata Kazuyuki, Oyamada Masakazu, Ueda Yasushi, Nemoto Kazumasa, and Morita Noboru. The music was composed by Hayashi Yuki.
